of the Landgren and Collins Families

Family Tree Lineage Index
Mary Aylesworth

According to the Descendants of Joseph Greene, Mary Aylesworth’s parents were Arthur Aylesworth and Mary Brown of Quidnesset. Her mother was the daughter of Rev. John Brown and Mary Holmes of Providence, Rhode Island. Mary Holmes was the daughter of Rev. Obediah Holmes of Newport.

According to The Genealogical Dictionary of Rhode Island, Obadiah’s daughter Mary did indeed marry a John Brown of Chad and Elizabeth Brown, and the two had a daughter named Mary. This Mary is assumed to be the same Mary who married Arthur Aylesworth.

See The American Family of Rev. Obadiah Holmes

John Browne, born 1634, son of Rev. Chad Browne.

Mary, daughter of of Rev. Obadiah, must have been born about 1648.
